1: @@//ma de bzhin du//tsheg drag lci ba can ldan no//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad+ma'i na bza' dang /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma dang /pad+ma gar gyi dbang
2: phyug ma dang /sna tshogs pad+ma zhes bya ba pad+ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi gsungs so//gling bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang //sgo srung ma tshogs 'dus pa ste//me tog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang //
3: pad+mas mtshan ma 'dzin par zad//dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te/dpal pad+ma gar gyi
4: dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//o yig thig le dang ldan par//sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o//bden bral phyi rol pa la yang //byang las bzhi pa gang
5: yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//tsheg drag u yig sbyor bar bya//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste//byang las
6: bzhi pa gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan//
7: bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//tsheg drag mnyam por
8: ldan pa yi//dbus las tha ma pa dang ldan//de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa//sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya//byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi
